name: Alkmaarse Eigenste

config_properties.name: Alkmaarse Eigenste
config_properties.description: A single-day discovery festival in Alkmaar showcasing local and emerging artists.

ai_profile:
**Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026: A Celebration of Dutch Musical Diversity**

Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026 brings together 25 talented artists, all hailing from the Netherlands, to celebrate a vibrant spectrum of musical styles. The festival showcases a strong focus on alternative and indie genres, with highlights including alternative rock, indie rock, dream pop, and shoegaze. A variety of other genres—ranging from blues rock and americana to electronic pop and reggae—add depth and diversity to the lineup, ensuring something for every music lover. The festival’s eclectic mix of sounds reflects its commitment to embracing the many facets of Dutch musical talent.

The event also shines a light on gender diversity, with a balanced representation of female and male artists, alongside bands and artists of unspecified gender. However, the lineup is less diverse in terms of racial representation, with only one artist identified as a person of color. While this indicates room for growth, the festival’s wide array of genres and artistic styles creates a platform for unique and varied voices within the Dutch music scene.

Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026 has received a warm reception, with an average artist rating of 8.63 from 76% of the lineup. Notably, 11 artists received outstanding ratings in the 9-10 range, highlighting the high caliber of talent gracing the festival. With 64% of the acts having Spotify links available, attendees can explore much of the lineup ahead of time, deepening their connection to the music and preparing for the unforgettable performances that await.
